nodes.value: Sitio web de viajes
travel website
An online site for booking flights, hotels, etc.
I always use a travel website to plan my holidays.
Motor de búsqueda
search engine
A program that searches for items in a database (e.g., Google)
A search engine helps you find information online.
Noticias en línea
online news
News content distributed via the internet
Many people read online news instead of newspapers.
Sitio de redes sociales
social networking site
A platform for building social networks (e.g., Facebook)
Facebook is a popular social networking site.
Sitio de descarga de música
music download site
An online platform to obtain music files
You can buy albums from a music download site.
Sitio para compartir fotos
photo sharing site
A website for uploading and sharing digital photos
Instagram is a well-known photo sharing site.
Tablón de mensajes
message board
An online discussion site where people can hold conversations
Gamers often use a message board to discuss strategies.
Difícil concentrarse
difficult to concentrate
Hard to focus attention
Many find it difficult to concentrate on a Friday afternoon.
No es de extrañar / Sin sorpresa
no surprise
Not unexpected; something that is understandable
It’s no surprise that people waste time when they are tired.
Iniciar sesión / Conectarse
log on
To perform the actions that allow you to begin using a computer system
People log on to news websites or social media.
Sitios web de noticias cargados
heavy news websites
News websites with a lot of content or that attract much traffic
They waste time by logging on to heavy news websites.
Videos tontos de gatos
silly cat videos
Amusing, often trivial, videos featuring cats
Watching silly cat videos is a common way to waste time online.
Planificar nuestras próximas vacaciones
planning our next holiday
Organizing the details for a future vacation trip
Some people spend work time planning their next holiday.
Desafortunadamente
unfortunately
It is unfortunate that; unluckily
Unfortunately, the problem isn’t just a Friday problem.
Distraído/a por
distracted by
Having one's attention diverted by something
People are distracted by the internet and social media.
Informe
report
An official account or statement
A report has shown how much time computer users waste.
Usuarios de computadora
computer users
People who use computers
Computer users waste up to eight days a month on the internet.
Malgastar hasta
waste up to
To use or expend carelessly up to a certain amount
They waste up to eight days a month.
Cuestionado/a
questioned
Asked questions, typically in a formal context like a survey
Most of the people who were questioned said they were distracted.
Malo para las relaciones
bad for relationships
Harmful to connections with other people
The study showed that the internet can be bad for relationships.
Discutir con
argue with
To speak angrily to someone, telling them that you disagree
People argue with their partners about internet use.
Parejas (sentimentales)
partners
A person with whom one shares a romantic or domestic relationship
They argue with their partners who spend too much time online.
Pasar demasiado tiempo
spend too much time
To use an excessive amount of time on something
People spend too much time in front of their computers.
Dispositivo móvil
mobile device
A portable computing device like a smartphone or tablet
They spend too much time on their computers or mobile device.
Afortunadamente
luckily
By good luck; fortunately
Luckily, there is a simple answer to the problem.
Respuesta simple
simple answer
An easy or uncomplicated solution
There is a simple answer to this problem.
Desconectarse de internet
get off the internet
To stop using the internet
The simple answer is: get off the internet.
Seguir con la vida
get on with life
To continue living your life, often after a difficulty
Get off the internet and get on with life.
Averiguar / Descubrir
find out
To discover a fact or piece of information
Read the text to find out if people waste time.
Perder tiempo
waste time
To use time in a way that is not effective or productive
Do you think people waste a lot of time on the internet?
Tiempo libre
free time
Time available for hobbies and other activities you enjoy
Is being on the internet a good way to spend your free time?
Discutiendo
discussing
Talking about something; debating
Listen to three people discussing the internet.
Declaraciones / Afirmaciones
statements
A definite or clear expression of something in speech or writing
Are the statements true (T) or false (F)?
Verdadero
true
In accordance with fact or reality
Is the statement true or false?
Falso
false
Not according with truth or fact; incorrect
The information was false.
Preferir
prefer
To like one thing or person better than another
Some people prefer the internet to sport.
Navegar en internet
Surfing on the internet
Browse websites casually
Surfing on the internet can be addictive.
Adictivo
addictive
Causing or likely to cause someone to become addicted
Some people find surfing on the internet addictive.
No poder dejar de usarlo
can’t stop using it
To be unable to cease the activity of using something
Some people can’t stop using it.
Peligroso
dangerous
Able or likely to cause harm or injury
Meeting strangers online can be dangerous.
Gente peligrosa
dangerous people
Individuals who pose a threat or risk
You can meet dangerous people on the internet.
Descanso del trabajo
break from work
A period of rest from one's job
The internet is good when you want a break from work.
Suspender títulos universitarios
fail university degrees
Not to succeed in obtaining a university qualification
Spending too much time online can cause people to fail their university degrees.
Pérdida de tiempo
waste of time
A bad use of time
For some, the internet is a waste of time.
¿Usas/visitas alguno de estos?
Do you use/visit any of these?
¿Cuáles visitas más frecuentemente?
Which ones do you visit most frequently?
¿Crees que son útiles/no muy útiles? ¿Por qué?
Do you think they are useful/not very useful? Why?
Muchos de nosotros encontramos difícil concentrarnos un viernes, así que no es sorpresa que casi la mitad de nosotros perdamos tiempo en el trabajo un viernes por la tarde.
Many of us find it difficult to concentrate on a Friday, so it’s no surprise that nearly half of us waste our time at work on a Friday afternoon.
La gente está perdiendo cada vez más tiempo distraída por internet y las redes sociales cuando deberían estar trabajando o estudiando.
People are wasting more and more time being distracted by the internet and social media when they should be working or studying.
Un informe ha mostrado cómo los usuarios de computadoras pierden hasta ocho días al mes en internet.
A report has shown how computer users waste up to eight days a month on the internet.
La mayoría de las personas que fueron cuestionadas dijeron que se distraían 'todo o la mayor parte del tiempo' cuando trabajaban o estudiaban en línea.
Most of the people who were questioned said they were distracted ‘all or most of the time’ when they work or study online.
El estudio mostró que internet también puede ser malo para las relaciones, ya que la gente discute con sus parejas que pasan demasiado tiempo frente a sus computadoras o dispositivos móviles.
The study showed that the internet can be bad for relationships too, as people argue with their partners who spend too much time in front of their computers or mobile device.
Afortunadamente, hay una respuesta simple al problema: desconéctate de internet y sigue con tu vida.
Luckily, there is a simple answer to the problem: get off the internet and get on with life.
¿Cuál es el problema con las tardes de viernes?
What is the problem with Friday afternoons?
¿De qué tipo de distracciones habla el artículo?
What kind of distractions does the article talk about?
¿Cuánto tiempo pierde la gente sin trabajar?
How much time do people waste not working?
¿Por qué es internet malo para las relaciones?
Why is the internet bad for relationships?
¿Crees que estar en internet es una buena manera de pasar tu tiempo libre o crees que la gente pasa demasiado tiempo en internet?
Do you think being on the internet is a good way to spend your free time or do you think people spend too much time on the internet?
Los hombres ambos usan internet en el trabajo.
The men both use the internet at work.
La mujer piensa que la gente no debería usar internet cuando está en el trabajo.
The woman thinks people shouldn’t use the internet when they are at work.
Los hombres ambos piensan que internet es una pérdida de tiempo.
The men both think that the internet is a waste of time.
La mujer dice que algunas personas prefieren internet al deporte.
The woman says some people prefer the internet to sport.
Navegar en internet es: adictivo. Alguna gente no puede dejar de usarlo.
Surfing on the internet is: addictive. Some people can’t stop using it.
Navegar en internet es: malo para las relaciones.
Surfing on the internet is: bad for relationships.
Navegar en internet es: peligroso. Puedes conocer gente peligrosa en internet.
Surfing on the internet is: dangerous. You can meet dangerous people on the internet.
Navegar en internet es: bueno cuando quieres un descanso del trabajo.
Surfing on the internet is: good when you want a break from work.
Navegar en internet es: causar que la gente suspenda sus títulos universitarios porque pasan demasiado tiempo en sitios de redes sociales cuando deberían estar estudiando.
Surfing on the internet is: causing people to fail their university degrees because they spend too much time on social networking sites when they should be studying.
Navegar en internet es: una pérdida de tiempo.
Surfing on the internet is: a waste of time.
